title: Grilled peach, burrata and basil salad with Dijon dressing
description: Buratta is becoming increasingly popular in restaurants and is an insanely decadent cheese – made from mozzarella and cream wrapped in more mozzarella. Parma ham would be a nice addition to this if you fancied it.
ingredients: 1 tbsp balsamic vinegar (not a syrupy one)
flaked sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 peaches, almost ripe but not too soft, quartered and stoned
200g/7oz ball burrata, drained and torn into chunks (or 2 x 125g/4½oz balls mozzarella)
1 bunch of basil, leaves only, roughly torn
